title: "wahlen"
format: html

```{r setup}
library(here)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(plotly)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)

df <- readRDS(here::here("data", "publish", "wahlen.rds"))
```

```{r}
nc <- sf::st_read(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package="sf"), quiet = TRUE)

leaflet(nc) |>
  addTiles() |>
  addPolygons(
    weight = 1,
    fillOpacity = 0.5,
    popup = ~NAME
  )
```

## Interaktive Zeitreihe

```{r}

plot_ly(df, x = ~jahr, y = ~wert, type = "scatter", mode = "lines+markers")
```

## Tabelle

```{r}
DT::datatable(df)
```
